faq.question: What's included in the free plan for startups?
faq.answer: Free plan includes 100 pages/month - perfect for weekly competitor research and technical docs. Upgrade to Starter ($9/mo) when you need more.

faq.question: Do you offer discounts for YC or accelerator companies?
faq.answer: Yes! 50% off all paid plans for YC, Techstars, and other accelerator companies. Just email us with proof of acceptance.

faq.question: Can our whole team use it?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The Team plan ($49/mo or $24.50 with accelerator discount) includes unlimited users. Perfect for early-stage teams.

faq.question: What types of documents can we summarize?
faq.answer: Anything: technical papers, API docs, competitor pitch decks, market research reports, whitepapers, blog posts (as PDF), investor memos, and more.

faq.question: How does it compare to just reading?
faq.answer: Get the key insights from a 50-page whitepaper in 2 minutes instead of 2 hours. You still get all the important details, just 10x faster.

faq.question: Is our competitive research secure?
faq.answer: Yes! SOC 2 certified with encryption. Your competitive intelligence is private and never used to train our AI. Perfect for stealth mode.
